parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Diagnosis </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Registers new log file recording a network traffic and returns handle of the log. The log file is saved inside the Arma 3 root folder.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[logNetwork]] can potentially create a large log file.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[logNetwork]] logFile </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> logFile: [[String]] - Where to store the log  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> filter: [[Array]] of [[String|strings]] - ???? </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - handle for the logging </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_handle = [[logNetwork]] ["myLog.txt",[""]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[logNetworkTerminate]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 

</value></part></template>
